channel.title: Mehdi Yazdanian's Data Science Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Mehdi Yazdanian's Data Science Portfolio

item.title: Why I am Here?
item.description: This is re-phrasing of a quote from a podcast: “to be a winner in any arguments you need data science along with its nuts and bolts”. But this has another side to it. I am not into defeat anyone to be a winner. I am here to enjoy revealing hidden fact. However, when data scientists “Reject” or “Fail to Reject” any hypothesis, their argument(s) place them on the winner side.

item.title: Select Your Crew & Genre - Witness The Movie Rating (Prototype)
item.description: View Dashboard Project Requirements ✅ Shiny Web Applications ✅ HTML and CSS ✅ Rate Movie Based on Major Crew Selection & Genre using Machine Learning (GLMNET, RANDOM FOREST, XGBoost)

item.title: Greenhouse Gas Emission Forecast Application (Prototype)
item.description: View Demo Dashboard Project Requirements ✅ Shiny Web Applications ✅ HTML and CSS ✅ Greenhouse Emission Forecast using Machine Learning Algorithms (ARIMA | Prophet) ✅ Geographic Visualization within the App
